    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Configures UI elements.

      • initMenu

        public void initMenu(Player player,
                     javafx.scene.layout.Pane swapPokemonPane,
                     SwapPokemonController swapPokemonController,
                     javafx.scene.layout.Pane battlePane,
                     BattleLogic logic,
                     BattleController controller,
                     java.util.List<Pokemon> party)
        Initializes the Bag menu. This should always be executed before entering the Bag screen.
        Parameters:
        player - object representing the in-battle player
        swapPokemonPane - pane containing the Swap Pokémon menu
        swapPokemonController - Swap Pokémon menu controller
        battlePane - pane containing the Battle pane (previous screen)
        logic - logic responsible for Battle backend
        controller - Battle menu controller, responsible only for UI elements
        party - player party, using the order used in current battle instead of this found inside the player object

        Enables all category buttons.
